/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with lush green trees and bushes, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and scale to the view.
